mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(INTERNSHIP_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(INTERNSHIP_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'yes' WHEN TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(INTERNSHIP_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'not' ELSE 'no' END AS date_check, TL_JIC_EXTERNAL_INFO.*, TL_C_COMPANY_INFO.*, tl_c_internship_course.* FROM TL_JIC_EXTERNAL_INFO JOIN TL_C_COMPANY_INFO ON TL_JIC_EXTERNAL_INFO.EXTERNAL_PK = TL_C_COMPANY_INFO.EXTERNAL_PK JOIN tl_c_internship_course ON TL_C_COMPANY_INFO.company_pk = tl_c_internship_course.company_pk WHERE TL_C_COMPANY_INFO.EXTERNAL_PK = #{EXTERNAL_PK}

SELECT CASE WHEN TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(APPLYING_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(APPLYING_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END FROM TL_C_COMPANY_INFO JOIN TL_JIC_EXTERNAL_INFO ON TL_JIC_EXTERNAL_INFO.EXTERNAL_PK = TL_C_COMPANY_INFO.EXTERNAL_PK JOIN tl_c_internship_course ON TL_C_COMPANY_INFO.company_pk = tl_c_internship_course.company_pk WHERE tl_c_company_info.EXTERNAL_PK = #{EXTERNAL_PK}

SELECT tl_c_student_applying.*, tl_c_internship_course.*, TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO.*, TL_JIC_STUDENT_SEMESTER.*, tl_c_self_introduction. *, tl_c_self_introduction_img.*, TL_JIC_PROFESSOR_INFO.NAME AS PROFFESSORNAME, TL_JIC_DEPARTMENT_CATEGORY.NAME AS DEPARTMENTNAME FROM tl_c_student_applying JOIN tl_c_internship_course ON tl_c_internship_course.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK = tl_c_student_applying.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK JOIN TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO ON tl_c_student_applying.STUDENT_PK = TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO.STUDENT_PK JOIN TL_JIC_STUDENT_SEMESTER ON TL_JIC_STUDENT_SEMESTER.STUDENT_PK = TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO.STUDENT_PK JOIN TL_JIC_PROFESSOR_INFO ON TL_JIC_PROFESSOR_INFO.PROFESSOR_PK = TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO.PROFESSOR_PK JOIN TL_JIC_DEPARTMENT_CATEGORY ON TL_JIC_DEPARTMENT_CATEGORY.DEPARTMENT_PK = TL_JIC_PROFESSOR_INFO.DEPARTMENT_PK JOIN tl_c_self_introduction ON tl_c_self_introduction.STUDENT_PK = TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO.STUDENT_PK LEFT JOIN tl_c_self_introduction_img ON tl_c_self_introduction_img.SELF_INTRODUCTION_IMG_PK =tl_c_self_introduction.SELF_INTRODUCTION_IMG_PK WHERE tl_c_student_applying.internship_course_pk = #{INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK} AND TL_JIC_STUDENT_SEMESTER.SEMESTER_PK = ( SELECT MAX(SEMESTER_PK) AS max_se FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_SEMESTER WHERE TL_JIC_STUDENT_SEMESTER.STUDENT_PK = TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO.STUDENT_PK GROUP BY TL_JIC_STUDENT_SEMESTER.STUDENT_PK )
